column3: so no complaints there. We did end up spending a bit more money than we initially expected when we walked in
column4: but the waiter did tell us all the prices as we were ordering our food and drinks
column5: so that's more on us than them :) Overall
column6: I would potentially come back here for an important night like an anniversary or something
column7: but Houston has so many cool restaurants that I'd be tempted to try something else instead. In other words
column8: I didn't leave feeling like I absolutely had to come back. If we did go back
column9: I think we would choose some specific courses instead of doing the tasting.
